name: Nicer Turtleseed
description: Several improvements to how Turtleseed looks and how some of the site functions. Feedback is appreciated!
additional_info:
V1 Changelog:

- Removed the gradient from the header
- Made header icons a plain white, and smaller
- Moved the logo to blend in more with the other header icons
- Changed search bar slightly
- Made seeds less curved, have a white background and a smaller font
- Moved around the sidebar, village goals/proseedure are now on the bottom
- Got rid of the huge profile pic on the sidebar
- Spaced the seed box and buttons around it slightly more
- Removed shore love percentage from profiles (will return in V2 if requested)
- Made some parts of the profile page less transparent
- Made seeds on profiles match those on the shore
